name: MICROSOFT ATA [High Severity Alert]
description: Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics detected a high severity issue. More information may be available by pivoting to the original alert.

name: MICROSOFT ATA [Medium Severity Alert]
description: Microsoft Advanced Threat Analytics detected a medium severity issue. More information may be available by pivoting to the original alert.
query: class=microsoft_ata severity=[1,2,3,4,5] NOT ruleid:`gateway*` NOT srcipv4:$exclusions.global.srcipv4
